title: A Merry Little (Hat Trick) Christmas
description: ‘Tis the season to be jolly  Something is bothering Rhian, and his friends and family want to know what that is. His lovers, Garrick and Savannah, think they have an idea and they’re trying to give him some space. His teammates haven’t any clue, but they’re convinced that enough nights out and beautiful women making eyes at him will make it better. And his grandfather and sister just want him to be happy and to know that he is loved.  Rhian Savage does know he’s loved. He just wishes everyone else knew it, too.
author: Samantha Wayland
